parameters.name: command
parameters.description: API operations like INVOKE, VALIDATE, PROCESS can be set or by default PROCESS is set

recordIndicator.description: It specifies the type of record that is loaded

providerId.description: Authority who has provided the Identification. Allowed values are from the list of values defined in MFGI.

thirdPartyType.description: It specifies the type of the correspondant. For example: AU(Auditor), BK(Bank), DE(Depository)etc. Default value will be IS-Issuer. The LoV is available in the CMESS table CTCL.

nationality.description: It specifies the native country of the correspondant. The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

domicile.description: The correspondant's country of residence. The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

branch.description: It specifies the branch code of the correspondant. Allowed values are from the list of codes defined in MFGI.

externalTrustReference.description: It specifies the trust company to measure the trust limits of an investment.  Allowed values are from the list of Ids defined in MFGI.

dealAccount.description: It specifies the Deal account of Correspondent account linked to the central register. The field is not used by MultiFonds TA application.

defaultAccountMargin.description: Default account margin for future of  Correspondent account linked to the central register. The field is not used by MultiFonds TA application.

telephoneNumber.description: First telephone number of the correspondant

telephone2.description: Second telephone phone number of the correspondant

taxResidence.description: It specifies the country to which the correspondant pays tax. The LoV is available in the CMESS table PAYS.

mailCorrespondance.description: It specifies the correspondant to which the mails are sent to. Allowed values are from the list of Ids defined in MFGI.

paymentType.description: Payment type code of the correspondant. Allowed values: 1(Check), 2(Current account). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPPMT

paymentDescription.description: Payment type description of the correspondant.

BICCode.description: Bank Identifier Code of the correspondant

correspondantUpdateFlag.description: Allowed values are Y, N. Blank value is considerd as N. Y value means the equivalence for the correspondent ID with correspondantExternalId will be created if the providerId is 00

taxOption.description: It specifies tax options. For example: 01(Withholding tax), 01(Exchange of information)etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_TAXOPPA

payingAgentType.description: It specifies the paying agent type. For example:  00(External/Np processing), 01(Internal/Active), 02(Intermediate/Passive). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_PATYPE

rightType.description: It specifies the Right on fund by Right type ID.  For example: ALL(ALL), DAR0(Right Type DAR0) etc.  The LoV is available in the CMESS table RIGHT_TYPE.

zipCode.description: Postal zip code of correspondant.  Allowed values are from the list of codes defined in MFGI.

noDocumentFlag.description: This field is relevant only if the thirdPartyType is GE - Management Company. For all others this field is stored as N. Allowed values are Y(for Yes), N(for No).

paymentInstuctionType.description: The payment instruction type of the correspondant. For example: 0001(Cash), 0002(Preadvice), 0003(Swift)etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table PY_INSTYP.

GIInNumber.description: Global Intermediary Identification Number of the correspondant

attentionOfLine1.description: It specifies the name of the contact of the correspondant

subRedMethod.description: It specifies the global order sending method code used for External TA (taken either from TFC or from TA fund) available in the Global ordering of subscription/ redemption transaction. Mandatory if the ThirdPartyType is CT(Central Transfer Agent). For example: 01(Fax), 02(Swift MT), 03(Swift MX), 04(Manual sending). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_MTHD.

switchMethod.description: It specifies the global order sending method code used for External TA (taken either from TFC or from TA fund) available in the Global ordering of switch transaction. Mandatory if the ThirdPartyType is CT(Central Transfer Agent). For example: 01(Fax), 02(Swift MT), 03(Swift MX), 04(Manual sending). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_MTHD.

transferMethod.description: It specifies the global order sending method code used for External TA (taken either from TFC or from TA fund) available in the Global ordering of transfer transaction. Mandatory if the ThirdPartyType is CT(Central Transfer Agent). For example: 01(Fax), 02(Swift MT), 03(Swift MX), 04(Manual sending). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TYPE_MTHD.

receptionMode.description: Code for reception mode related to NSCC and Swift. For example: 0010(NSCC generic), 1502(SWIFT FIN)etc.  Mandatory if the ThirdPartyType is SC(STP Counterpart). The LoV is available in the CMESS table TA_ORDREC2.

SWIFTLANG.description: Swift language of the correspondant. For example: FIN(Swift FIN), SWBI(Swift BIC code), XML(Swift XML)etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table SWLANG

STPGroup.description: It specifies the User group ID for which user's rights to be given on order to load the STP orders. For example: @@@@(All group), DUB(Dublin), LUX(Luxembourg)etc. The LoV is available in the CMESS table GRP_USER

taxIdentificationNumber.description: TAX identification number of the correspondant

newDepositor.description: If the correspondant has the newDepositor (which is also a correspondant) linked and the correspondant is linked with an TFC as sponsoring entity then when Tax log file is generated the newDepositor appears on the Tax log file.
